/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/sensor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/gl_objects.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/avatar.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/sdlglutils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/events.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/CSurface.cpp.o  -o Avatar  -L"/home/nicolas/Bureau/Cours/Réalité Augmenté/Avatar/lib" -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDLmain -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL -lpthread -lSDL_image -lGLU -lGLEW -lGL -lglut -lOpenNI2 -Wl,-rpath,"/home/nicolas/Bureau/Cours/Réalité Augmenté/Avatar/lib"
